thread.title: Fly to Paris or Aberdeen from juts £49pp one way
thread.title_full: Fly to Paris or Aberdeen from juts £49pp one way

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Fly to Paris or Aberdeen from juts £49pp one way
text:
Fly to Paris or Aberdeen from juts £49pp one way Fly to Paris or Aberdeen from juts £49pp one way Details Category: Airport & Airline   10:45 Jet off to Paris or Aberdeen from Bristol in the New Year from just £49pp one way with bmi regional. The airline’s new low cost fares on these routes go on sale from 1 September 2015, with all tickets providing passengers with a superior service which includes in-flight complimentary bar and snack service, 20kg checked baggage and a speedy 30 minute check-in. Book from 1 September 2015 and travel from 1 January 2016 to two of Europe’s most charismatic cities. 
Catch the New Year sales in Paris, or surprise a loved one with a few days in the French capital of romance around Valentine’s Day or simply enjoy a cultural visit to the city to take in the galleries and museums. Alternatively, fly north to Aberdeen to try and catch the Northern Lights, cosy up with a locally-distilled whisky by an open fire or visit the Scottish seat of the Royal Family at Balmoral. The tickets will be available to purchase from Tuesday 1 September. Bookings must be made from this time with travel to be taken from 1 January 2016. Whether travelling for romance, culture or shopping, travellers will not be disappointed with bmi regional’s fantastic and punctual service. Related articles
